column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Thank you Cafe Ba-Ba Reeba for helping my friends and I to host a wonderful baby shower brunch! Michelle Gil was an absolute pleasure to work with during the planning process and couldn't have made things easier. Her excellent
column2: timely communication was very much appreciated. Even though we didn't have a huge group
column3: we still received extra special care and attention. Tabitha did an amazing job taking care of our party the day of the shower. I had never been to Ba-Ba Reeba for brunch before and will definitely be back again. All of the brunch tapas options were delicious. If you are looking for a great place to host a party
